name: NOY Backup File
summary: Learn about .NOY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOY files allow users to backup important files to protect them in case the files become corrupt or lost. The NOY file is the primary file type associated with NOY Backup Utility, which enables you to create and open NOY files.

description: A NOY file is a backup file created by NOY Backup Utility, a program used to create compressed backups of files. It contains one or more files or drives that have been compressed with Zip compression to reduce storage space.
